summary: A suite of integration tests exercising Conan's core graph manager, covering graph construction, dependency resolution, aliases, automatic package type detection, build requirements, option handling, provides, and versionâ€‘range constraints across diverse scenarios such as linear, diamond, transitive, and cyclic graphs.
business_intent: Validate and safeguard the correctness of Conan's dependency graph logic to prevent regressions, ensure reliable package resolution, and support complex C/C++ package configurations in production environments.
